prompts.prompt: Find books matching '{search}' written between {author_year_start} and {author_year_end}. Show the title, author, and download URL for each book.

template.name: search-books-by-title-and-year-range
template.title: Search books by title and author year range
template.description: Searches for books based on a search term and author year range. Shows key info and download links.

arguments.name: search
arguments.description: Keyword or phrase to search in book titles/authors.

prompts.prompt: Show the most popular books in {languages} right now. List the top 10 including title, author, and download formats.

template.name: popular-books-per-language
template.title: Popular books per language
template.description: Shows trending books per language. Lists the most popular ones with basic info and download options.

prompts.prompt: Give me all books on the topic '{topic}' in {languages}, including author, title, and bookshelf.

template.name: books-by-topic-and-language
template.title: Books by topic and language
template.description: Returns books filtered by topic (subject/bookshelf) and language, showing essential details.

arguments.name: topic
arguments.description: Subject or bookshelf, e.g., children, philosophy.

prompts.prompt: Get detailed information and download links for these Gutenberg book IDs: {ids}

template.name: get-books-by-ids
template.title: Get books by IDs
template.description: Fetches bulk details (title, author, formats) for multiple Gutenberg book IDs.

arguments.name: ids
arguments.description: Comma-separated list of Gutenberg book IDs.

prompts.prompt: Search for books available as {mime_type} containing '{search}'. Show title, author, and download link.

template.name: search-books-by-mime-type
template.title: Search books by file format
template.description: Finds books in a particular file format (e.g., EPUB, TXT) matching the search term.

arguments.name: mime_type
arguments.description: MIME type for file format (e.g., application/epub+zip).
